meanings.definition: Make (someone) familiar with or knowledgeable about something.
meanings.sent1: Reading books familiarizes children with different stories.
meanings.sent2: Her new job familiarizes her with the company's procedures.
meanings.sent3: The talking robot familiarizes kids with basic math in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: Traveling to new places familiarizes you with diverse cultures.
meanings.sent5: Practice familiarizes musicians with complex musical pieces.

meanings.sent1: Regular visits familiarize the neighbors with each other.
meanings.sent2: Over time, she familiarizes herself with the local customs.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat familiarizes itself with every corner of the house.
meanings.sent4: Experience familiarizes us with life's ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: Exploring nature familiarizes hikers with the beauty of the outdoors.
